channel.title: cloudflare on Fabrice Aneche
channel.description: Recent content in cloudflare on Fabrice Aneche

item.title: Enabling Cloudflare in front of your Kubernetes cluster with Traefik
item.description: I’m still using my arm64 4 nodes cluster for experimentation and even to serve some websites. Since I wanted to test some new Cloudflare features, I migrated one of my domain which has a bunch of websites on it. But first a quick and simple way to serve some static pages: Serving Static Pages One way is to build an image with the actual pages in it and let Kubernetes serves them.
